column1: Art Institute of Chicago////And I cannot fathom when there is a lot of space in the front door area plus the lobby why in the freezing bitterly cold you have people waiting for 30 mins to come inside.  Surely you can work out some kind of system.  People could get quite sick waiting like that. And why on earth if people have go cards which are meant to give them admission
column2: do you make them wait in the cold? It just doesn't seem logical.
